output.paragraph:
Congratulations for installing Eiffel Software's Eiffel, featuring
tools/eiffelstudio/index.xml EiffelStudio , the full-life cycle environment for quality software development, based on the most advanced version of object technology and the concepts of Design by Contract.
Eiffel Software's Eiffel is available on many platforms and is one of the first development environments to take advantage of the Microsoft.NET framework.

Eiffel Software's Eiffel comes with extensive online documentation. Please take the time to read up on Eiffel and the
tools/eiffelstudio/index.xml EiffelStudio environment to make the best possible use of the environment. Here is your road map to Eiffel documentation.
2Release notes
You will find out
tools/eiffelstudio/reference/02_what_s_new/Eiffel54.xml here what's new in this release.
2General documentation Make sure to read the introductory documentation, which includes:
Two presentations of the Eiffel method and language, one short (
general/guided_tour/language/invitation-00.xml "an invitation to Eiffel" ) and the other a
general/guided_tour/language/tutorial-00.xml detailed tutorial .
An in-depth, step-by-step
general/guided_tour/environment/index.xml Guided Tour of EiffelStudio . Highly recommended to master the environment's powerful tools for analysis, design, implementation, browsing, incremental compilation (the Melting Ice technology), debugging, documentation, HTML generation, metrics, cross-generation of C packages etc.
Complementary documents:
general/guided_tour/other/why_eiffel.xml "Why your next project should use Eiffel" and the
general/guided_tour/other/one_minute.xml "1-minute summary" (to show your boss!).
You will find the introductory documentation
general/guided_tour/index.xml here .
2Environment documentation
tools/eiffelstudio/index.xml EiffelStudio is the centerpiece of Eiffel Software's Eiffel, your friendly environment for conceptualizing, analyzing, designing, producing, documenting, debugging, exploring, measuring and maintaining systems. You will find
tools/eiffelstudio/index.xml EiffelStudio documentation
tools/eiffelstudio/index.xml here .
2Library documentation
ISE Eiffel is all about reuse. Thousands of reusable components help you develop your applications by standing on the shoulders of previous developers. Here is the documentation on the principal libraries:
libraries/base/index.xml EiffelBase : ISE's acclaimed open-source library covering the fundamental algorithms and data structures of computing science.
libraries/vision2/index.xml EiffelVision 2 : the extensive multi-platform graphical library for producing modern GUI applications that will run on Windows as well as Unix, Linux, VMS and other X-based platforms.
libraries/wel/index.xml WEL (Windows Eiffel Library) : powerful graphical library for Windows platforms.
libraries/com/index.xml EiffelCOM : your tool of choice for building and using Microsoft COM components. See also
tools/wizards/com/index.xml EiffelCOM Wizard .
libraries/net/index.xml EiffelNet : the client-server library for exchanging object structures across the network, between identical or different machine architectures.
libraries/time/index.xml EiffelTime : time and date library.
libraries/store/index.xml EiffelStore : object-relational database interface library.
libraries/thread/index.xml EiffelThreads : multi-threading library.
libraries/eiffel2java/index.xml Eiffel2Java : Java interface library.
libraries/web/index.xml EiffelWeb : Web interface library with support for easy development of CGI scripts in Eiffel.
libraries/lex/index.xml EiffelLex and EiffelParse : lexical analysis and parsing libraries.
2Documentation on other tools
See also the documentation on the following tools of ISE Eiffel 5:
tools/wizards/com/index.xml EiffelCOM Wizard : generates a COM client or server application, taking care of all the details.
tools/eiffelbuild/index.xml EiffelBuild : a GUI builder for the
libraries/vision2/index.xml EiffelVision 2 library.

paragraph.output:
Congratulations for installing Eiffel ENViSioN! ENViSioN! is a product of Eiffel Software Inc. ENViSioN! is Eiffel for . NET for Visual Studio . NET.
ENViSioN! gives software developers the ability to create software using the Eiffel method and language in combination with the with Microsoft Visual Studio .NET IDE. As you read this documentation, you will find that Eiffel provides capabilities that make it unique among the many .NET compatible languages. Eiffel is a full-lifecycle methodology and language for quality software development, based on the most advanced version of object technology and the concepts of Design by Contract. Eiffel Software's Eiffel is available on many platforms and is one of the first development environments to take advantage of the Microsoft .NET framework. ENViSioN! comes with extensive online documentation. Please take the time to read the documentation included with ENViSioN! so that you can make the best possible use of the language, methodology, and environment. Here is your roadmap to Eiffel documentation.
2General documentation Make sure to read the introductory documentation, which includes:
Two presentations of the Eiffel method and language, one short (
general/guided_tour/language/invitation-00.xml an invitation to Eiffel ) and the other a
general/guided_tour/language/tutorial-00.xml detailed tutorial .
Complementary documents:
general/guided_tour/other/why_eiffel.xml "Why your next project should use Eiffel" and the
general/guided_tour/other/one_minute.xml "1-minute summary" (to show your boss!).
2Library documentation
Eiffel is all about reuse. Thousands of reusable components help you develop your applications by standing on the shoulders of previous developers. Here is the documentation on the principal libraries:
libraries/base/index.xml EiffelBase : Eiffel Software's acclaimed open-source library covering the fundamental algorithms and data structures of computing science.
libraries/vision2/index.xml EiffelVision 2 : the extensive multi-platform graphical library for producing modern GUI applications that will run on Windows as well as Unix, Linux, VMS and other X-based platforms.
libraries/wel/index.xml WEL (Windows Eiffel Library) : powerful graphical library for Windows platforms.
